Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

My name is KSPNewbie and I am a bidding astronaut

I came to this game in pursuit of better understanding of spacecraft engineering and flight. I am also an avid model rocketeer in real life as well.

I live in Canada so it's hard for me to become an astronaut but I know if I try I'll be able to do it!! 

thanks in advance,

KSPNewbie

Hello, and welcome to the forum.

We have many Canadians and a few model rocketers already, so you will find plenty of friends.

Hello KSPNewbie, and welcome!

I'm another Canadian KSP player and forum-goer.  Good luck in your aspiration to become an astronaut.

Happy landings!
Someday Bombardier will make us a booster system. Or not.
